title: Respond to a Press Inquiry
description: A journalist has emailed with questions for a story about the company. A PR manager needs to coordinate a response.

tasks.description: Acknowledge receipt of the journalist's email and inform them you are working on a response.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a prompt and professional initial reply.

tasks.description: Share the journalist's questions with the relevant internal subject matter experts to get accurate answers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent routes the questions to the correct people within the company.

tasks.description: Consolidate the answers into a single, approved statement and send it to the journalist before their deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a complete and approved response to the press.
